Alectryon examples¶

This page is for testing and should be removed prior to release.

Basic example¶

forall y x : nat, S x <= y -> x <= y

  
y: nat
IHy: forall x : nat, S x <= y -> x <= y
H: S y <= S y
y <= S y
y: nat
IHy: forall x : nat, S x <= y -> x <= y
x: nat
H: S x <= S y
H1: S x <= y
x <= S y

  
(* info eauto: *)
simple apply le_S.
simple apply le_n.
(* info eauto: *)
simple apply le_S.
simple apply IHy.
exact H1.

Qed.
